flavorText: Debts to rakshasa linger beyond death.

foreignData.flavorText: Schulden bei den Rakshasas erlöschen nicht mit dem Tod.
foreignData.name: Rakshasa-Grabruferin
foreignData.text:
Ausschlachten (Wenn diese Kreatur ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur opfern.)
Wenn die Rakshasa-Grabruferin eine Kreatur ausschlachtet, bringe zwei 2/2 schwarze Zombie-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Las deudas contraídas con un ráksasa te perseguirán más allá de la muerte.
foreignData.name: Llamatumbas ráksasa
foreignData.text:
Aprovechar. (Cuando esta criatura entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura.)
Cuando el Llamatumbas ráksasa aproveche una criatura, pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Zombie negras 2/2.

foreignData.flavorText: La mort n'éponge pas les dettes contractées auprès des rakshasas.
foreignData.name: Meneuse de tombe rakshasa
foreignData.text:
Exploitation (Quand cette créature arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une créature.)
Quand la Meneuse de tombe rakshasa exploite une créature, mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.

foreignData.flavorText: I debiti verso i rakshasa perdurano oltre la morte.
foreignData.name: Evocasepolcri Rakshasa
foreignData.text:
Sfruttare (Quando questa creatura entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare una creatura.)
Quando l'Evocasepolcri Rakshasa sfrutta una creatura, metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Zombie 2/2 nere.

foreignData.flavorText: ラクシャーサへの債務は死の後も残る。
foreignData.name: ラクシャーサの墓呼び
foreignData.text:
濫用（このクリーチャーが戦場に出たとき、あなたはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げてもよい。）
ラクシャーサの墓呼びがクリーチャーを１体濫用したとき、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猫・デーモン

foreignData.flavorText: 락샤사에게 진 빚은 죽어도 사라지지 않는다.
foreignData.name: 락샤사 무덤소환사
foreignData.text:
수탈 (이 생물이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다.)
락샤사 무덤소환사가 생물을 수탈할 때, 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: As dívidas com os rakshasas estendem-se para além do túmulo.
foreignData.name: Evocador de Túmulos Rakshasa
foreignData.text:
Explorar (Quando esta criatura entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar uma criatura.)
Quando Evocador de Túmulos Rakshasa explorar uma criatura, coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura pretas 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.

foreignData.flavorText: Долг ракшасу не пропадает и после смерти.
foreignData.name: Ракшас, Призывающий Мертвых
foreignData.text:
Угнетение (Когда это существо выходит на поле битвы, вы можете пожертвовать существо.)
Когда Ракшас, Призывающий Мертвых угнетает существо, положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 2/2 черный Зомби.

foreignData.flavorText: 欠了罗刹的债死后也依然要还。
foreignData.name: 召墓罗刹
foreignData.text:
榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）
当召墓罗刹榨取生物时，将两个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 欠了羅剎的債死後也依然要還。
foreignData.name: 召墓羅剎
foreignData.text:
搾取（當此生物進戰場時，你可以犧牲一個生物。）
當召墓羅剎搾取生物時，將兩個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物放進戰場。

name: Rakshasa Gravecaller
originalText:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: A creature with exploit “exploits a creature” when the controller of the exploit ability sacrifices a creature as that ability resolves.
You choose whether to sacrifice a creature and which creature to sacrifice as the exploit ability resolves.
You can sacrifice the creature with exploit if it’s still on the battlefield. This will cause its other ability to trigger.

If the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield as the exploit ability resolves, you won’t get any bonus from the creature with exploit, even if you sacrifice a creature. Because the creature with exploit isn’t on the battlefield, its other triggered ability won’t trigger.
You can’t sacrifice more than one creature to any one exploit ability.

text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
